name: Warsim: The Realm of Aslona - Press Kit
name_original: Warsim: The Realm of Aslona - Press Kit
description:
I'm a game developer from Cardiff, Wales. I've been working on games on and off for 6 years and learned how to program by watching youtube videos and online tutorials, I spent a great deal of time learning about and practicing procedural generation and eventually went on to create several games that use it.

ARTICLES WRITTEN ON THE GAME

  • A developer interview regarding the game
  • A review of the game
  • A breakdown of the race generation system
  • An article about the procedural face system

Screenshots/Press images/Banners and logos all available in press pack below!
